iMarket Solutions, www.imarketsolutions.com, web development, search engine optimization, and online marketing company, is looking for a senior PHP programmer with a passion for development to join our team. This position will involve designing and building web interfaces, web applications, and web services-senior knowledge or experience in these areas is required. A successful candidate will work in harmony with other team members and management team to ensure development of systems and tools that will make iMarket efficient and enhance the user experience.
